name: Katamari Prototype
description:
Thank You!

Support me on Patreon and help make the games you've always wanted to play.

Get access to the source code on Github

Controls
  • WASD to move around
  • QE to rotate the camera
Description

This is just a simple prototype to see if I could make a Katamari style game. I've had a few ideas on how it would be done, and it turns out they were correct!
